params._feePercent: Royalty fee numerator; denominator is 10,000. So 500 represents 5%
Royalty fee numerator; denominator is 10,000. So 500 represents 5%

returns._0: uint256 Cost price for contract deployment
uint256 number of all deployed contracts

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

allCreatedContracts(uint256).notice: Array of all deployed contract addresses

cost().notice: Contract deployment cost in USD as wei

createdContracts(address,uint256).notice: Mapping of address (deployer) to created contracts

getCost().notice: Function to get contract deployment cost

getCreatedContracts(address).notice: Function to get all deployed contracts by an address

getLatestPrice().notice: Function to get latest network native token price

getTotalCreatedContracts().notice: Function to get number of deployed contracts
